trade_in.free_shipping_description:
Shipping to us for trade-in is simple, free and insured.

We'll send you everything you need so you can get your gear to us fast and safe.Once it's arrived and your equipment has been checked over by one of our camera experts, you'll recieve the amount we quoted you by bank transfer in a couple of days.
